title: Federated learning via augmented knowledge distillation for heterogenous deep human activity recognition systems
abstract: This paper presents federated learning with knowledge distillation for heterogeneous human activity recognition systems.

title: Joint self-organizing maps and knowledge-distillation-based communication-efficient federated learning for resource-constrained UAV-IoT systems
abstract: This work proposes a novel federated learning approach for UAV-IoT systems using self-organizing maps and knowledge distillation.

title: Communication-efficient and privacy-preserving federated learning via joint knowledge distillation and differential privacy in bandwidth-constrained networks
abstract: This paper addresses communication efficiency and privacy preservation in federated learning through joint knowledge distillation and differential privacy.

title: An explainable AI system for medical image segmentation with preserved local resolution: Mammogram tumor segmentation
abstract: This work presents an explainable AI system for medical image segmentation focusing on mammogram tumor detection.

title: Real-time lane instance segmentation using SegNet and image processing
venue: 2020 2nd Novel Intelligent and Leading Emerging Sciences Conference (NILES)
abstract: This paper presents a real-time lane detection system using SegNet architecture combined with image processing techniques.

title: Communication-efficient federated learning in drone-assisted IoT networks: Path planning and enhanced knowledge distillation techniques
venue: 2023 IEEE 34th Annual International Symposium on Personal, Indoor and Mobile Radio Communications
abstract: This paper presents communication-efficient federated learning techniques for drone-assisted IoT networks with enhanced path planning.

title: Communication-efficient privacy-preserving federated learning via knowledge distillation for human activity recognition systems
abstract: This work proposes communication-efficient privacy-preserving federated learning for human activity recognition using knowledge distillation.

title: Joint knowledge distillation and local differential privacy for communication-efficient federated learning in heterogeneous systems
abstract: This paper presents joint knowledge distillation and local differential privacy techniques for communication-efficient federated learning.

title: Deep learning-based context-aware video content analysis on IoT devices
abstract: This work presents deep learning-based context-aware video content analysis techniques optimized for IoT devices.

title: Federated learning with selective knowledge distillation over bandwidth-constrained wireless networks
abstract: This paper proposes federated learning with selective knowledge distillation for bandwidth-constrained wireless networks.

title: Mammogram tumor segmentation with preserved local resolution: An explainable ai system
abstract: This work presents an explainable AI system for mammogram tumor segmentation with preserved local resolution.

title: Light-weight federated learning with augmented knowledge distillation for human activity recognition
abstract: This work presents light-weight federated learning techniques with augmented knowledge distillation for human activity recognition.

title: Towards Optimized IoT-based Context-aware Video Content Analysis Framework
venue: 2021 IEEE 7th World Forum on Internet of Things (WF-IoT)
abstract: This paper presents an optimized IoT-based framework for context-aware video content analysis.

title: Optimizing VNF Migration in B5G Core Networks: A Machine Learning Approach
venue: 2024 International Conference on Smart Applications, Communications and Networking
abstract: This paper presents a machine learning approach for optimizing VNF migration in B5G core networks.

title: REDUS: Adaptive Resampling for Efficient Deep Learning in Centralized and Federated IoT Networks
abstract: This work presents REDUS, an adaptive resampling technique for efficient deep learning in centralized and federated IoT networks.

title: Enhanced Environmental Awareness and Security for Smart Devices using WiFi-Sensing
venue: 2025 7th International Congress on Human-Computer Interaction, Optimization and Robotic Applications
abstract: This paper presents enhanced environmental awareness and security techniques for smart devices using WiFi sensing.

title: EXAD: Framework for Designing Explanations in Adaptive User Interfaces
venue: 2025 7th International Congress on Human-Computer Interaction, Optimization and Robotic Applications
abstract: This work presents EXAD, a framework for designing explanations in adaptive user interfaces.

title: Combating Malware Traffic in Emerging Networks: A Collaborative Learning Approach
venue: 2024 International Conference on Smart Applications, Communications and Networking
abstract: This paper presents a collaborative learning approach for combating malware traffic in emerging networks.
